descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000]I AM NOT PART OF THE NEXUS TEAM[/color]
[size=2]This Is Just A Project Im Working On :)[/size]


[size=3]Hello! My Name Is Dillon. And This Is My First Addition To The Nexus Community.
[/size]I Am A Regular Player Of Skyrim, And Have Made Some Mods In My Time.

[size=5]ABOUT THIS[/size]
[size=3]This Application Is A Application For Using Nexus Without Opening Your Web Browser, It Has The Same Functionality
[/size]Of A Browser, But It Is Just For Nexus.

[size=5][b][u]WILL I BE UPDATING THIS TO HAVE MORE FEATURES?
[/u][/b][/size]
Yes, As Of Now It Is In Basic-Form. I Will Continue This When I Have Spare Times, Hence I Am Not A Full-Time Programmer. And I Have Other Projects
To Work On.

ENJOY THIS! ~ If You Have Suggestions / Constructive Criticism Then Go Right Ahead :D
author: Dillon
